channel.title: Sections on Canishk Naik
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on Canishk Naik

item.description: I am a PhD student in the Economics Department at the London School of Economics and Political Science with interests in public and behavioural economics. I am on the 2024-25 job market. My LSE webpage is here, and my email is c.naik@lse.ac.uk. I use he/him pronouns. I have a BA in Mathematics from the University of Cambridge and an MSc in Applicable Mathematics from the LSE. Before the PhD, I was an Economist at The Behaviouralist, a behavioural science research consultancy.
